divs: Sighting Detailswe were in dyer indiana going east headed for home,when we sighted what we first thought was a hot air ballon firing up but was to high up and moving to fast.it took about 7 minutes to go from east to west.comercial planes were headed east to west and were't nearly as high and not as fast.we both have never seen anything like this.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dyer
There were no other sightings in Dyer on or around September 14th 2009
